item.title: Self-Compassion
item.description: [Self-Compassion](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Self-compassion]: extending compassion to one’s self in instances of perceived inadequacy, failure, or general suffering. Three components of self-compassion: Self-kindness: being warm and understanding toward ourselves, withholding judgement of ourselves Common Humanity: recognizing that suffering and personal inadequacy is part of the shared human experience Mindfulness: mental clarity regarding emotion and mental state A few swirling thoughts:
